title: Le Bouclier Réjouissant

fields.name: Monopoly Bonus:
fields.value: Gain 2 **Happy**, 💵, and 🛡️ every turn you take.

desc:
Post 1966
- Set Color: Alexandrite
_ _
- When you play this, gain 1 🛡️.
- While this is in your personal status, whenever you play a card, you may spend 1 🛡️ to draw a <:monopoly:1171651746762866799> card in the Alexandrite set.
 - For each house bought, gain 1 🛡️.
 - When a hotel is bought, gain 2 🛡️.
 - For each skyscraper bought, gain an extra 🛡️ every time you lose 🛡️ or gain **Card Shard**s 🔷.
